metadata.name: Founders Legacy Ringz
metadata.description:
The story of Legacy is the story of a bunch of friends with millions of ideas. We all are sports fans with our own preferences (basketball, F1, football...). 

 To begin this trip, we wanted our teammates to identify us easily. And what’s best than putting a champion ring on our fingers! 

 This first collection is a unique series of 5 NBA© 2020 championship rings with LBJ name and N°23 on it. These NFTs are untransferable and will be used to identify us at anytime. 

 Let the game begin!
